backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two UI changes to their affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing precomputed summaries for numerous frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry loading Leaflet assets and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the EarthquakeDashboard in a ThemeProvider with dark mode default.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/Dashb: Displays three styled dashboard summary cards for total events, threshold events, and largest magnitude.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/Earth: Modal dialog showing detailed earthquake info, including magnitude, metadata, and optional moment tensor data.
Leaflet-based map that renders markers, filters by bounds, and includes a full-screen toggle control.
Renders a virtualized earthquake results table with selectable rows and fallback UI when no data is available.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/FeedA: Provides controls for time window, magnitude filter, search input, and refresh actions for earthquake feeds.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/Panel: Shared card wrapper component that standardizes panel headers, optional actions, and content layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and persisted identities via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting that USGS data fetching is handled elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsgsEarthquakes.ts: Fetches USGS earthquake feed data using React Query with periodic refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsgsEventDetail.ts: Fetches and caches USGS event detail JSON for a specific earthquake when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useVirtualWindow.ts: Implements a lightweight virtualization hook computing visible item ranges based on scroll position.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables for light/dark themes, Leaflet layer adjustments, fullscreen map styles, and UI animations.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeFilters.ts: Provides filtering and sorting utilities for USGS earthquake features by time window, magnitude, and place.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeMapBounds.ts: Filters earthquakes to those within padded Leaflet map bounds, handling date-line wrapping.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeStats.ts: Computes basic earthquake statistics including totals, threshold counts, and largest magnitude.
frontend/src/lib/fetchJson.ts: Fetches JSON from a URL and throws on non-OK HTTP responses.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Formats timestamps, magnitudes, depths, and coordinates for UI display.
frontend/src/lib/leafletTypes.ts: Defines Leaflet type interfaces and utilities including marker creation with magnitude-based styling.
frontend/src/lib/mmi.ts: Converts MMI values to formatted text, Roman numerals, and descriptive labels.
frontend/src/lib/usgsEventDetailTypes.ts: Type definitions for USGS event detail responses, including moment tensor product structures.
frontend/src/lib/usgsFeeds.ts: Generates USGS feed URLs and provides magnitude labels and color categories.
frontend/src/lib/usgsTypes.ts: Type definitions for USGS GeoJSON features, responses, and filter settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/EarthquakeDashboard.t: Main dashboard page handling filters, view modes, data fetching, and earthquake detail selection.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, implemented features, and pending feature requests.
